name: Monster Girls Makeup Dress Up
description:
Let's play amazing Monster Girl Salon DressUp!!

In this game there are three different character and variety of makeup collection with various types.Come and give your girl an incomparable beauty. Here, countless festival themes are offered on purpose, such as beautiful monsters, lovely witches and bloody vampires. Hurry to show us your sense of unique style!

In this game there are three different levels. Like Spa, Make up and Dress Up. In Spa levels there are so many different cream for face and scrub. Apply one by one and completed this treatments. In second level is Make Up. So In this levels there are different hairstyle, eyebro, earline, nose ring, Tattoo, Face Mask, earring, and many more. And Last level is Dress Up. In this levels so many monster Style dress up. So choose as you like and completed this all levels.

Every girl loves to go to salon and do monster makeup. So are you ready for play this game? It's Free Game. Download Now!

Features:
======
- Three different characters.
- There are so many cosmetic items.
- HD stunning graphics.
- Endless monster dress up collection.
- Share and save photo functionality.

So are you ready for play! It's amazing game. Download Now!!!
